content:
**EXISTING STRUCTURES**

### Electricity Generator at Position (10, 20)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (11, 20)
- Boiler at Position (10, 21)
- Offshore Pump at Position (9, 20)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (15, 25)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (16, 25) and a Furnace at Position (17, 25)
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (16, 26) and a Furnace at Position (17, 26)
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (16, 27) and a Furnace at Position (17, 27)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (20, 30)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (21, 30) and a Furnace at Position (22, 30)
- Assembling Machine at Position (23, 30) and Inserter at Position (22, 31) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup at Position (22, 30) that connects the Furnace at Position (22, 30) to the Assembling Machine at Position (23, 30)

**ERROR TIPS**

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when Connecting Belts Incorrectly
- Verify the direction and connectivity of belts to ensure materials flow correctly between entities.

### Errors when Assembling Machine Input is Incorrect
- Double-check the input materials and configuration of the assembling machine to match the intended recipe.
